<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Accursed Touch](/Feats.aspx?ID=3525) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 52</row>

**Archetype** [Mummy](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=180)

**Prerequisites**
[Mummy Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3520)

</column>

---

You've learned to harness the supernatural curse that animates you, imbuing your most powerful attacks with a terrible curse. When you critically hit with a fist Strike, negative energy binds to it; this is a [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38) and a [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46). The creature takes 2d6 [persistent negative damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). While the creature has this persistent damage, it's also [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37). The persistent damage increases to 3d6 at 14th level and 4d6 at 20th level. This is a [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).

<title level="2">Accursed Touch leads to...</title>
[Channel Rot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3527)
name: Accursed Touch
